title: Florida Condo-Style Retreat Steps from Hollywood Beach with Rooftop Pool
description:
Dazzling sun-kissed coastlines and pristine white sands await when you escape to Costa Hollywood Beach Resort - a condo-style retreat perfectly positioned in the heart of iconic Hollywood Beach, South Florida. Tower over the glitz and glamour with a stay in a gorgeous, fully equipped suite, complete with full kitchen and designer touches.

Costa Hollywood Beach Resort is nestled between Hollywood Beach Broadwalk and Hollywood Beach, surrounded by chic cafés, alfresco dining, ultra-cool bars, and an unmissable entertainment scene. Onsite, an impeccable list of facilities will keep you entertained, including an expansive rooftop terrace with a pool and bar, a gymnasium and a café.
offer_address: 777 N Ocean Dr, Hollywood, FL 33019, United States
